mapper.sql: id, uid, content, images, video, create_time AS createTime, location_name AS locationName, location_longitude AS locationLongitude, location_latitude AS locationLatitude, type
mapper.select: SELECT dynamic.id as id, dynamic.uid as userid, info.nick_name as nickname, dynamic.create_time as publishtime, dynamic.images as photos, dynamic.content as word, dynamic.video as video FROM user_dynamic dynamic LEFT JOIN user_info info ON dynamic.uid = info.id WHERE dynamic.status = #{status} ORDER BY dynamic.uid
